resources.string: Following users are supporting the developer of Printoid on Patreon, a huge thanks to them! Patreon is the best platform to support the creators and their work!
Following users are supporting the developer of Printoid with donation of the amount of their choice. It is the best way to buy a coffee or a beer to the developer!
Following users are amazing users: they did the translation of Printoid in many languages. A big thanks to them for their huge contribution to the Printoid project!
